name: GetCostTypeById
description: Use this endpoint to load a single Cost Type by id/number.

$ul:
**costGroupNumber**: The number of the cost type group that the cost type belongs to.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: true

**isBarred**: It shows whether the cost type can be used to create expenses or not.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**lastUpdated**: The date when the cost type was last updated.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**name**: Name of the cost type.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin, like

Sortable: true

**number**: The unique number of the cost type.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**objectVersion**: The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**vatCode**: The code for the Vat that's going to be applied.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: true

**developerHint**: Some hints for the developer that might help avoid the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**errorCode**: The error code.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logId**: The unique log identifier of the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logTimeUtc**: The UTC time of the error being logged.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**message**: Short description about the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false
